text: Ware ga kare-ra to yakusoku shita (warui kekka no) ichibu o,(seizon-chū ni gen wa shite) anata ni shimeshite mo, matawa (sore o shimesu mae ni) anata o ware ni meshite mo, yahari kare-ra wa ware ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki arrā wa, kare-ra no itta subete ni tsuite risshō sa reru kata de ara reru
